website_summaries.verdict: A beautiful choice to accompany other appliances from the Ensemble line.
pros: The included tongs stow away in a special nook so they don't get lost
Cool Touch exterior means you don't feel the heat
Slide-out crumb tray, defrost button, and bagel button are convenient features
cons: Bigger than the average toaster at 12.5 x 7.9 x 9.4 inches

customer_reviews.title: Good toaster with bad ergonomics
customer_reviews.text: The toaster works fine, but it's encased in a unit that's too deep for regular toast. I assume that's to accommodate bagels. The toaster includes plastic tongs to help you remove short toast in the deep slots, and so you aren't tempted to stick anything metal inside and electrocute yourself. After using this toaster for over two years and fishing out lots of bits of toast with the tongs, I finally threw it out this morning in disgust.
customer_reviews.author: Martha W. Bonney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Toaster
customer_reviews.text: Great product that toasts evenly across the spectrum of products, including frozen bread and bagels. Remains cool to the touch and the included tongs are nice for small pieces of bread that settle back in after it pops up. What seems to be amazing is that the product can self-regulate temperature; I haven't had to use the temperature control button on either fresh or frozen bread. I've just got it set on "3" and in a short amount of time, the bread is ready. Nice pop-up feature that works perfectly. I also really like that crumbs remain in the toaster and don't fall out until the bottom pan is removed. Great color (black and silver) that doesn't absorb fingerprints.
customer_reviews.author: Analytical Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Don't Bother!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the product looking forward to the tongs and my morning Bagels. However, the toaster arrived with NO tongs. The company asked after several calls( Leaving messages as instructed and Hamilton Beach not returning calls) finally getting in touch, instead of sending a tongs in the mail, they ask that I cut the cord and they will send a completely new toaster, but the toaster worked ( at the time, YES past tense) after 6 weeks the toaster stopped working altogether....piece of crap, don't waste your money or your time. When it comes to the basics like a toaster, I suggest you buy it at your locally retail stores....what a waste of energy and time!!! Hamilton Beach...NO thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Rashu

customer_reviews.title: READ: DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: Please purchase at your own risk, this toaster worked twice, then nothing...The handle to push down did not work at all after two uses. Tried every outlet to be sure it was an electrical problem in the kitchen, NOPE. Had to go through the recyclable tote to find the box to send back. I was lucky I saved the invoice and instruction. I normally would toss this stuff out after two uses with no problem - I now see so many reviews that indicate not to buy this - my fault didn't not read them. So disappointed - will send back for refund and go to a local department store to purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: Cindra Mongiovi

customer_reviews.title: Toaster is big.
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is attractive and toasts OK once you figure out which setting works for the desired tastiness. It is large for a two slice toaster. It has a bagel setting, but I can't figure out what that does. The slots are large enough for bagels and for extra wide bread slices. January 2015: My toaster died after a period of schizophrenia where it would under cook one slice of bread and burn the next. I changed my stars to one as a toaster is not new technology and certainly should last a least a year of light to moderate use. Very disappointing. Now I have to start over vetting toasters.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: First thing, this toaster was always incredibly slow -- ...
customer_reviews.text: First thing, this toaster was always incredibly slow -- it took ages to toast bread to a simple "lightly browned" state. Then, after about 6 months, it started breaking down. You could toast one set of slices, but then you would have to wait until the toaster was completely cooled off before it would let you push down the handle and toast the next set. Now today, 10 months after purchase, it won't toast at all and once again I am shopping for a new toaster. Don't bother purchasing this toaster, it has been nothing but aggravation from the start.
customer_reviews.author: KatInTheNW

customer_reviews.title: Toast Tongs are the shiz!
customer_reviews.text: Cool sides, and Toast Tongs on board! Awesome. I and no idea how much I was missing by not having toast tongs parked right in my toaster. Life-changing. However, I must say I thought I was getting "extra-wide," but what I would really describe it as "extra-thick." A fat bagel or a piece of Texas toast will be right at home, but if you have a "wide-pan" loaf of bread (i.e. regular thickness, but wider slice), it will not fit. I think this was my bad, because honestly who makes what I'm describing. Just as easy to cut it in half and toast it that way, because, even if it falls out of reach...toast tongs!! huzzah.
customer_reviews.author: NeverBetter

customer_reviews.title: Just the Basics Please
customer_reviews.text: This toaster became the answer to a silent prayer I had each morning while late for work and waiting almost 10 minutes for a piece of toast from our toaster oven. Based on the simplicity in function and design I give it four stars. I am especially pleased with the cancel button that lets you eject the toast or bagel ahead of schedule if you have decided that you set the wrong darkness in the first place. The unit is well made, modern-looking, and works well. Overall I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: amazonj

customer_reviews.title: The toaster works just fine. Bread toasts according to the level you set ...
customer_reviews.text: The toaster works just fine. Bread toasts according to the level you set (I like mine light, husband likes his dark) so we're both happy. It can hold thicker slices of bread or four smaller pieces, such as the pugliese bread we like. My husband now uses the plastic tongs to reach the English muffin instead of sticking a fork in the toaster--so much safer. I like that there is a little storage place for the tongs too. I would have given it 5 stars except I miss the little red "on" light my other toaster had.
customer_reviews.author: k. c.

customer_reviews.title: Terrific toaster!
customer_reviews.text: I love this toaster! The controls are easy to see. The black color goes well with my appliances and is easy to clean . The stainless steel one I had before was a pain to clean and had little ridges where the crumbs would collect and were hard to remove. I'm a grandmother so I'm sure you moms will appreciate plastic tongs instead of the metal knives and forks kids usually use to to pry things out of toasters ! The slots are wide enough for thick slices of bread. It's compact and doesn't take up a lot of room on your counter. Good price too!
customer_reviews.author: Carol D.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: This is such a good looking toaster, I was pleasantly surprised when it also turned out to be an excellent toaster as well! Form and function together. The coils don't glow when they heat the bread/bagel, which was unusual at first. It also had a chemical smell when it was brand new. I ran through the toasting cycles about 10 times and the smell dissipated. The toaster is well-built, and has on-board plastic tongs to retrieve stuck items without the need to stick a fork in the toaster. I use them just to pull my toasted bagels out because they're so handy. Well-designed, sturdy and good-looking. I really love this toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Toaster
customer_reviews.text: Awesome toaster. Toasts perfectly so far. I've only had it for a few months but I haven't had any issues. The self contained tongs are a really handy standard feature, and the crumb tray is easy to remove and has so far caught any crumbs. Nothing continues to dump out of the toaster after I remove the tray. Also the color is great. It's bright enough to be fun and interesting, but it not so vibrant as to look childish or obnoxious.
customer_reviews.author: mlong432

customer_reviews.title: Hamilton Beach Toaster
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of time searching for a toaster. They either seemed too cheap or too expensive. I am very happy I purchased this one. It toasts nicely and has a bagel feature. I thought the tongs were going to be a waste, but I use them a lot to grab my English muffins. Mainly, it toasts. I wasn't sure how I would like the red, it is goes perfectly with my white countertops and my green walls.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Austen

customer_reviews.title: Hamilton Beach SmartToast XtraWide 2-slice Toaster
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new toaster, after MUCH research and shopping, found this one received the consistently best ratings from Amazon and through [...] We've had it almost a month now and it is THE best toaster (out of many) we've ever had. Toasts evenly is the big thing. Like the "cancel" toasting button that pops-up the product instead of pushing up the dropbar and having the product come flying out of the toaster. We thought the tongs might be frivolous, but found I've actually used them quite often. Highly recommended, and VERY reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Mack

customer_reviews.title: LIked it more than I thought I would
customer_reviews.text: I really like this toaster. When reading the description, I thought the tongs sounded stupid, but you know what? Having used the toaster for almost two months, all I can say is - what a brilliant idea! Always there when you need them, no more burnt fingers. I am really pleased with this toaster, although the power cord could be a little longer. Works well, takes up very little counter space and does a good job toasting bread. 3 YEARS LATER - I am still happy with this toaster. Bread toasts to medium setting at 2 minutes, 30 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster, really fun design
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. I love this thing! I did take off one star though, because the settings seem slightly deceptive to me, because compared to my previous toasters, the doneness of say, setting 2, is what on my others would have been setting 3. But once you find what works for you it is great! Another quick note, I thought the addition of the "tongs" was a cute touch, just be aware that they are just red plastic. That doesn't affect how it toasts, though, so doesn't really matter, I wanted to mention it because I didn't see it anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Michael McBride

customer_reviews.title: Near-perfect
customer_reviews.text: So far I like this toaster. I haven't had it for too long, so if it breaks in the next year I'll change my review. I love the tongs that come with the toaster--no more burned fingers and trying to dig out your english muffin with a knife (after unplugging it, of course). The only reason I'm giving if 4 stars instead of 5 is because it doesn't have a retractable cord. My last toaster did, and although it turned out to be a piece of junk, I really enjoyed the retractable cord! Too bad this one doesn't have one or else it'd be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: ADK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toast every time!
customer_reviews.text: Had been using a toaster that we had to keep an eye on - pop toast up manually every few minutes to be sure toast didn't burn. Burnt an awful lot of bread. The first time we used this I had to fight the urge to pop it up to check and see how things were going. Wow, what a thrill (seriously!) to see that perfectly toasted piece of bread pop up all on its own! Bagels are a joy to toast now, too. I love the way it looks, too. It's a terrific product that I would highly recommend to anyone looking for a perfect toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Frugal

customer_reviews.title: Excelent product for the Price.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a red toaster, but one of good quality. Have always had good luck with Hamilton Beach brand. Good Price, Excellent Quality, Love the toast grabber, had one but love that its right there and don't have to dig for it in the drawer. There is only two of us so did not need a 4 slice. I love having the bagel/ defrost button. Cant wait to try the defros button on the toaster pastries and see if they taste better. Was better than I exptected, very happy with it! Get more features sthan one of higher coast
customer_reviews.author: Debbie P Reese

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother for toast.
customer_reviews.text: It's okay is all I can say. After a few months of toast with all kinds of sizes of bread, I am not impressed. It is very mediocre. I have yet to get a good piece of toast. (I used to toast my bread under the broiler and get wonderful toast. This is my choice of how to get a good piece of all-over toast.) All I can say is that the RED COLOR is spectacular. Looks great. Just doesn't make great toast at all.
customer_reviews.author: r.d.

customer_reviews.title: Serious reliability problems
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of cool sides and a slot to hold the tongs, but this model has performance and reliability issues. It seems to toast much more slowly than my previous toaster (black and decker). My first Hamilton Beach toaster stopped toasting on one side within 30 days. I can no longer push the toast down in my replacement unit. I've only used it a couple of times, but unfortunately my 30 day return window has closed. The second toaster has begun its trip to a land fill. Fool me twice. Shame on me.
customer_reviews.author: Rural User

customer_reviews.title: Fine Bagel Toaster
customer_reviews.text: This bagel specific toaster works quite well. When I tried waffles, the highest setting was not enough and I had to give it a second heating. This may be because the slots are extra wide for the bagel. The tongs are a nice touch but lifting the lever usually easily brings up the bagel to grab by hand. Most of the toaster runs cool except the top area. There is a setting where only 1/2 the heating elements go on. This causes the item to heat rather than toast but cannot be used on frozen items.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: I like it so far.
customer_reviews.text: So far this toaster has done well. It browns very evenly and has a large range from barely toasted to ashes. It does quite well with bagels, even frozen waffles. (Not so for things like Pop Tarts though) It is a steady heat, but not a strong heat so it takes longer to toast with this toaster than the one I had before. The top is metal and easily cleaned, but is does get pretty hot if you're doing an assembly line of toasting. As of 3-2017 it's still going, though the silver on the most used buttons is worn off.
customer_reviews.author: Vaughn T. Hangartner

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this toaster!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best toaster I have ever owned. I saw the negative reviews for the cheap material used to make this toaster but I think it looks very attractive. I love the red color. And the tongs are a GREAT addition as is the defrost button. I use that feature all the time for the frozen French toast. I just use the defrost button and it is done perfectly. I would buy this exact toaster again and I would recommend it to my friends. I even like the shape of the toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: works well so far
customer_reviews.text: maybe i am out of it but for the price i didn't expect a fully plastic toaster. the darkness settings are 1 -5 it barely browns on 4 so if you like darker toast this may not be the toaster for you. however we are only using gluten free products in this so that may affect the darkness. the selection buttons (defrost, bagel and cancel) light up blue when pressed, my kids love that
customer_reviews.author: terabma

customer_reviews.title: this is by far been the best toaster owned
customer_reviews.text: You would think finding something as simple as a reliable toaster wouldn't be a huge headache. After a Waring that burnt one side while leaving the other slightly toasted, after a black and decker that just stopped working after a year, I found this gem. So far, this is by far been the best toaster owned. Even toasting every time. If you want a reliable toaster without spending a ton of money, look no farther.
customer_reviews.author: WrenchedXJ

customer_reviews.title: Everything a Toaster Should Be
customer_reviews.text: They thought of everything for this toaster! Great settings, easy to use. The tongs are such a great addition as well. I'm not sure why all toasters don't have these because I use them almost every time I use the toaster. Who wants to dig down into a burning hot toaster to grab their bagel with their meat mitts? Not I.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Sandifer

customer_reviews.title: The great little toaster
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the tongs. Very cool addition. It is a toaster, and works as such, so there isn't too much to really say. There are some toasters that just don't seem to have appropriate settings, I suppose, but this is one awesome little toaster. It's cute, small, convenient to leave in place on the counter because it doesn't take a lot of surface area, and it toasts accurately to the presumed setting. I really love the tongs and their convenient space within the toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Erica E

customer_reviews.title: Good toaster, poor color match for Ensemble
customer_reviews.text: Good toaster, and a subdued red color. Actually, it's too subdued if you buy the HB Ensemble coffee maker as well, because the coffee maker is a much brighter red, and the two don't match. I took off one star for that, but if you're just buying the toaster, no worries. Nice wide slots, toasts evenly, even has a set of tongs so you can get things out without burning your little fingers. I don't know how I survived the dangers of getting toast out before I had tongs. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Jim C

customer_reviews.title: Good toaster but only lasted 2 1/2 years.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this toaster in March 2014. We really like it. The tongs are handy. The toaster toasts evenly. BUT, lately the prong inside one of the slots is falling down so the toast does not get toasted. I took the toaster apart and repaired it. Repair lasted about a month. Two and a half years isn't a very good "life" span. Poor design for long-term use. Not sure whether I will buy another one although it's the best toaster we've had in many years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, attractive, useful tongs, makes good toast
customer_reviews.text: I burn myself frequently getting things out of the toaster and the tongs on this thing has been so great. It doesn't look like the priciest thing in the world but its attractive enough. I keep my setting between 2 and 3 - anything else is too brown for me! Wide slots are great for frozen waffles and the likes. There aren't exposed wires like in the older toasters, but it glows of course, which ... has no real impact on my decision, but might for you.
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Nice color with stainless to set it off
customer_reviews.text: Nice color with stainless to set it off. Works well and is easy to clean. Plenty of toasting options, too.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine DeHaven

customer_reviews.title: Almost there...
customer_reviews.text: Works better than my last toaster (Hamilton Beach), but still doesn't provide an even toasting on both sides. I tried it with one slice, and one slot performed better than the other. I tried it with two slices and neither was evenly toasted on both sides. I use Country Hearth English Muffin Bread (which makes great toast!) - maybe a different type of bred would toast more evenly? I don't understand why this is such a difficult goal to achieve....
customer_reviews.author: Smashed

customer_reviews.title: It's only a toaster...right....if you don't mind uneven toasting.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very picky about toast and have tried just about every model from incredibly expensive to these which are around $25. I was shocked that a $25 toaster could brown my toast evenly on both sides EVERY TIME. If you are in the market for a toaster that works better than cuisanart haierer, Magic chef, etc stop right now and buy this toaster. I fits bagels and can be used with frozen products. Like I said be fore no more burnt spots then non-toasted spots you get a uniformly toasted piece of bread. Best $25 I've spent in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Nice and reliable toaster
customer_reviews.text: I love the vibrant red color of this toaster. It matches some of my other small appliances. Its slots are large enough to toast bagels, english muffins and other breads. The only issue I had with this product is that it is a lot taller than my older toaster so I have to figure out where to store it since it doesn't fit in my cabinet anymore. It even comes with the little plastic tongs to pull your toast out with. I would definitely recommend this product. Just be prepared for a taller toaster.
customer_reviews.author: kcee74

customer_reviews.title: How did I ever live without the tongs?!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice toaster at a reasonable price! I make (and slice) my own bread and this toaster does a great job holding every size slice from very slim to bagel size without mangling the bread. The tongs were a lovely bonus which my husband loves when he has to get the bagels out and I love because I don't have to hunt down where he stuck them the last time he used the toaster! I agree with other reviewers that this toaster is a bit slow, but that doesn't bother me a bit.
customer_reviews.author: LeeBeeN1954

customer_reviews.title: Great Toaster- What I Expected for the price
customer_reviews.text: I really like this toaster. I bought to replace a $10 toaster I had before that (after 2 years of use) had stopped working. This toaster seems to be a step-up from that one. I really like that it has a special setting for bagels and the tongs are a nice bonus. The top of it is some kind of plastic so it feels kind of cheap but it really isn't bad and it works really well so I don't mind. Plus it isn't like it was really expensive.
customer_reviews.author: britanie89

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great works even better!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this product for a while now - The black shiny material looks really good sitting on your kitchen top. Also the heating works well for a crisp toast. You do have to spend some time figuring out the exact number for setting up the heat on what works for you. But it isnt too hard. Also I like the fact that it comes with its own Tong and a Tong holder. You never have to look around what to use to get those stuck bagels out of the toaster!
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Only toast's half of bread!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toaster because of customer ratings and it did ok for about 6 months but now it only toast's half the bread! I need to turn the bread so it will toasts all over the bread. Very frustrating that I spent the extra money for a better toaster and now its no better than a cheap toater!
customer_reviews.author: DANTE PASQUINI

customer_reviews.title: SLOW
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed at how long it takes to make a piece of toast on here. I am glad I have a very small family, or we would never get to eat toast. I also notice that bread toasts hotter on bottom than on top, not consistent at all. The little tongs are a great touch, wonderful idea. I am not going to pay to send it back, but would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: MJJ

customer_reviews.title: we love our toaster
customer_reviews.text: we love our toaster!! The features are great and easy to use / understand! The 'prong' tool that pulls out your items as needed is a great addition here (except ours is currently MIA?!?). The black and brushed steel are beautiful and this toaster stays out on my counter all the time. Super happy with this. Oh, the crumb tray is easy to work with too and I like the part where you can 'eject' /cancel an order if you need to remove something.
customer_reviews.author: Becky J

customer_reviews.title: A decent replacement for our old toaster for the price...
customer_reviews.text: Our old toaster was falling apart, so we needed a decent replacement, but didn't want to spend a ton. I liked the on-board tongs with this version, and the fun color. It is a little bulky, but does have nice wide slots to fit bagels, which is nice. It does take a little longer because this version has covers that guard the heating elements. Probably a good safety feature and provides nice even browning, but I do get a little impatient sometimes. For what we paid, this toaster works just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Molly H

customer_reviews.title: Good Toaster - does what is needed
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this toaster last year and while we don't use it everyday, it has held up well for our needs. The slots are wide enough for the wider items but smaller items don't get lost. We still ate Pop-Tarts when we first got it and it worked fine for those, just make sure they are centered in the slots. Tongs are handy for the shorter items. After having to toss our old toaster that was 20+ years old, this has made a good replacement.
customer_reviews.author: MNMom18

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This toaster has worked great for us! I love the little tongs to get out hot toast. And the controls work great in terms of how 'done' you want your toast. I do notice that the more you toast, the more done the toast becomes, so you might want to pay attention and adjust the settings accordingly. But, that doesn't bother me. It's a nice looking toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Shane P Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great Toaster
customer_reviews.text: I really like this toaster. It works great and looks terrific. The slots are big enough so the bread does not have to be put in sideways. Guys, this is a man's toaster! It's also a big fellow. This is the Dodge Ram pickup truck of toasters. That shiny black paint job and chrome will look good in the kitchen or the garage. It will raise the T levels wherever you put it. ;-) No regrets with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Wenning

customer_reviews.title: Two years of daily use and it's still going. ...
customer_reviews.text: Two years of daily use and it's still going. The heating elements have degraded over the years so I have to set the power a step or two above what I actually need for it to work. One of these will last you a year with flawless performance, and even longer if you adjust the way you use it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex S.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $85. Doesn't toast evenly.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toaster in July, 2014 and it was $24.99. Now I see it is $85.00 - Yikes! But the reason for my low review is because it does not toast evenly. Toasts dark on the top and untoasted on the bottom. So I have to turn the toast over and toast it some more upside down. The only really good thing about this toaster is the tongs. Maybe that's what the extra $50 is for.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy-Q-Ranch

customer_reviews.title: well performing toaster and stylist too
customer_reviews.text: I like its versatility: toast (all sizes of bread) and bagels. It is easy to cancel if needed. What I really like are having the plastic tongs to pull the bread out of the slots--we like breads that are not standard sizes and previously had to use knife or fingers, neither very safe. It is slower than toasters I have had previously but that matter is a small one in terms of the other benefits. I am very pleased with the candy apple color.
customer_reviews.author: coffee lover

customer_reviews.title: Hamilton Beach Toaster
customer_reviews.text: Love the color! I am giving four stars as the unit seems to be a bit erratic in operation. I have had toast burn at the same setting that it was just right on an other occasion. Also, the tongs (while a great idea) are in a bad spot behind the heat. The slots are very wide and have accommodated everything so far.
customer_reviews.author: Turtalya

customer_reviews.title: hamilton beach toaster
customer_reviews.text: love love the color. the first use you can smell the plastic but it does go away quickly. my daughter and husband asked why i got a red one. i love how bright and pretty red it is. and i have a lot of red accents in my kitchen. i really like that the thongs fit in the back. I used thongs on my other toaster but i had to just lay them on top.
customer_reviews.author: angelinoz

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly browned toast form a GREAT toaster!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great toaster. Works extremely well and you can control the length of browning with a slide switch which works very well. It also has a pop up button if you wish to stop the browning of toast. Very easy to use and after 6 months it is still working great! This appears to be a keeper and was a very reasonable price in comparison with other toaster on Amazon. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Best Toaster EVER!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best toaster I have ever owned (I am 60 so I have owned many a toaster in my life). It toasts very evenly, something I had looked for in a toaster for quite a long time. The price is excellent, there is no need to spend more money on a toaster, this one works GREAT! I love the little tongs that come with it, cute bonus and very handy indeed. I highly recommend this toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Angel PW

customer_reviews.title: the setting of 3 is good for bread but doesn't do it for a bagel ...
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping for a toaster that would toast the surface of the bread or bagel evenly. This one doesn't quite make the grade. Also, it is necessary to change the darkness setting depending on what you are toasting, the setting of 3 is good for bread but doesn't do it for a bagel which requires a 5 for the same depth of toasting. The bagel setting is nothing I use. I want to toast both sides of my bagel, not just one! The tongs are very handy and a great addition.
customer_reviews.author: obedjudge

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressive
customer_reviews.text: Mostly plastic. Has a cheap feel. Does a reasonably good job of toasting.
customer_reviews.author: DN

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not quite as good as I expected based on the ratings.
customer_reviews.text: I love the tongs feature. The bagel function actually works the way it is supposed to - unlike my previous toaster. My only minor gripe is that the toast is not as evenly toasted as my previous toaster. it's not horrible, but so far everything that i have toasted is darker towards the top than at the bottom. Since the primary job of a toaster is to toast bread evenly, i knocked off a single star.
customer_reviews.author: realitybytez

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy but seems to work well (have only used it ...
customer_reviews.text: Not very sturdy but seems to work well (have only used it a few times). Future purchasers (esp. those with kids) should be aware that the chrome top of the toaster becomes exceeding hot. The enclosed tongs are a nice touch, but if you leave them in their storage slot while you're using the toaster, they become very hot, which sort of defeats their purpose. Take the tongs out prior to using the toaster.
customer_reviews.author: verizonstinks

customer_reviews.title: Good design toaster
customer_reviews.text: Just want a toaster that reliably makes toast, and this seems to do it. I give it only 4 stars because I wish it had a light to show when it was down and toasting. There are lights when "Bagel" mode is on, etc. The heating coils don't glow brightly and so I wish it was more obvious when toast is toasting or when it's done. That being said, it seems to be a good product.
customer_reviews.author: M in SC

customer_reviews.title: Toaster
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered this toaster. I was not happy at first because I thought he paid to much. I am now ashamed that I gave him a hard time about it. It makes beautiful toast, Those little tongs are a super add on, no more poking with a butter knife to get something out. This is a super addition to my "small appliance" hoard---:0)
customer_reviews.author: vivian c

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster. Like the idea of the tongs
customer_reviews.text: Great toaster. Like the idea of the tongs. So often in the past, I would be reaching for anything I could find to help me get the toast out. This toaster raises the bread up high but just in case it's not high enough or you don't want your fingers to touch the toast the tongs are right there.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: First toast out was a hair light so I adjusted up a 1/2 a notch and it was perfect. For the heck of it I backed it ...
customer_reviews.text: If two slices is ok with you, you can't go wrong with this toaster. I did research quite a few and decided to get this one. Thought the tongs were a gimmick but I actually use them. First toast out was a hair light so I adjusted up a 1/2 a notch and it was perfect. For the heck of it I backed it off a 1/4 and it was barely lighter - surprised me at the control of it.
customer_reviews.author: Jhanses

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable well made product
customer_reviews.text: I have had this toaster for about six months and whatever makes the bread come up does not work. I have to manually pull it up. I had a ten dollar toaster for years with no problems. I live alone so it does not get much use that it should break so quickly. I bought it because the cheap one did not have a cancel button. I would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: REGULAR AMAZON CUSTOMER

customer_reviews.title: So far I am very happy for it
customer_reviews.text: So far I am very happy for it. The browning is fairly even, especially at this price point. Would buy it again. Still haven't found a need for the tongs. I can easily reach items like bagels which are shorter. It does help to manually push up the handle as the weight of the bagels keeps the handle from going all the way to the top.
customer_reviews.author: Test Shoot

customer_reviews.title: Smart and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value. The toasting elements are covered and the built in tongs are very handy. The exterior is resistant to fingerprints and smudges. It also remains cooler than metasl toasters. We have used the Smart Toaster for all the bread products in our diet:bagels, English muffins and several types of breads. Al turn out beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: W. Muller III

customer_reviews.title: If you own this clean it constantly
customer_reviews.text: Went into the trash today. It was nice that it had tongs but when we went to clean out the crumbs the underside tore and all kinds of wires were exposed. It has a pull out tray for cleaning rather than the trap door. We cooked a lot of seeded bagels and I guess waited too long to clean it. Also the printing wore off on the buttons.
customer_reviews.author: SexySadie

customer_reviews.title: This toaster is pretty good. It cooks a little slower than other ...
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is pretty good. It cooks a little slower than other toasters I have had but the various settings for one sided bagel toasting, etc. are handy. You can fit the oversized multi-grain breads in it instead of trying to squish it into a Wonder Bread sized slot. Don't know how long it will last but so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: msfrazer

customer_reviews.title: Bought for neighbor going to get myself one!!!
customer_reviews.text: My neighbor was always complaining about his toaster not toasting or half toasting. I read reviews and they were great and the price was right. I bought and had it sent to his house as a surprise. He and his wife were thrilled about how perfect their toast came out and that it was set up for bagels.
customer_reviews.author: Laddie H.

customer_reviews.title: Extra wide?  No.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed in this toaster. It barely accommodates regular slices of bread let skopje anything thicker! Also, it takes forever to toast anything, and it's very hard to clean crumbs out of it due to its weird inner cage. My family is not thrilled with my purchasing decision in this matter.
customer_reviews.author: J. H. I.

customer_reviews.title: Good toaster
customer_reviews.text: This toaster makes great toast. It does not require advanced knowledge to operate. The controls are simple and intuitive. It does bagels and big slabs of homemade bread with ease. It is easy to clean and maintain and the little tongs actually serve a purpose. I like this toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin B.

customer_reviews.title: Attractive toaster at an equally attractive price.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I both enjoy warm yeast rolls. The slots on this toaster is large enough to accept our favorite sliced yeast rolls and toast them slightly as we prefer. The smell of toasting yeast rolls is hard to beat! The darkness control functions very well and has been consistent. It is very easy to clean. I love the red color on ours.
customer_reviews.author: kaba

customer_reviews.title: Slots are Wide but Too Short
customer_reviews.text: The toaster produces good toast and accepts most sizes of bread. The rye bread I use is a store bought mass produced loaf that will not fit into the slot without a little compression. If the slots were a fraction longer it would get 4 stars from me. I am satisfied with the toaster for most breads and it works well with English muffins.
customer_reviews.author: William L. Williams

customer_reviews.title: larger than the picture looks, but a great toaster
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item because I was looking for a 'compact' toaster. When it arrived, I took one look and thought "this item is going straight back" because it is at least as large as any comparable toaster. I decided to try it out first, and discovered it to be a great not so little toaster. That was a few months ago, so I'm ready to admit I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Reader

customer_reviews.title: Decent toaster.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good toaster, except the letters on the controls wore off. Not good quality printing on them. I've had it for several years now.
customer_reviews.author: MaineMan

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Toaster
customer_reviews.text: I really like this toaster. The wide slots make it real easy to toast bagels and rolls. The tongs on the side are nice so you dont burn your fingers. Easy to adjust the control to toast lightly or darker - however you want. Small enough to leave on the counter. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Fochler

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster
customer_reviews.text: I love this toaster. I've used it for toast and bagels. I like how you can use the bagel setting so it only gets 1 side of the bagel. And the tongs are great! No more sore finger tips from hot toast. I just wish I could have had it in a different color than red. Most of my small appliances are grey or white. Oh, well. A minor inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: DaBoujibo

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: The toaster is nice in that the sides don't get hot, and the slots are adequately wide, but it does not do well with toasting English muffins. We have to put English muffins in for two rounds of toasting just to get the muffin not to be uncooked and white, let alone nicely toasted.
customer_reviews.author: hnaz

customer_reviews.title: Hamilton Beach Smart Toaster
customer_reviews.text: When I got the toaster in came in broken,not a problem it was return without a problem.And it was replace quickly. Sorry I can not say if it made great toast brought it only for it look.The person brought it for love it a lot.So it was for be and them.5Stars for the vendor for there quick service
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for bagels and frozen waffles but not toast
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for toast but it is actually for bagels. Not even a "toast" option, just "defrost" "bagel" and "cancel". Works great for bagels and frozen waffles but not toast. Only toasts one side of the bread. It's a lovely piece though and the tongs fit on the unit. I use it but now have to buy a toaster for toast. I don't regret the purchase though.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Twice As Long to Make Toast
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking toaster and the toast tongs are kinda handy. BUT the only thing it does consistently is toast one side of the bread much more than the other. So if you are patient and want to flip your bread around to toast the side that didn't get toasted I guess this is works.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Best toaster ever
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my mother, and it's already her favorite appliance!! Whenever I'm over and using it, I can see why. It always toasts evenly and quckly, is easy to adjust, and the tongs that come with are extremely handy, and safer to use, as they're purpose built.
customer_reviews.author: JesterGraphic

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toaster because I wanted red and one the would accommodate bagels. The tongs are handy. It has taken me a couple of tries to get the darkness setting right. I have toasted bread, bagels, belgian waffles and halved pita bread. The toaster does stay cool so I can push it back into the corner.
customer_reviews.author: Brutus

customer_reviews.title: Works Very Well, A little light weight...
customer_reviews.text: The toaster works very well with all thicknesses of breads, muffins, bagels, etc. The settings are accurate and trustworthy. The toaster is light weight, which I'm not sure if that matters, but it seems less substantial in construction than other toasters I've had. Overall, we are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: FloridaCathy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice color and seems to be working just like it was advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: I used it occasionally for 2 years, nothing excessive ...
customer_reviews.text: I used it occasionally for 2 years, nothing excessive, maybe a couple times a month. But the first time I ever used the "Bagel" setting, after about 3 seconds the toaster started smoking and made a loud pop, then the toaster was dead. It no longer works at all now. Definitely not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I like this toaster very much. The color is a nice red. It takes a bit for the darker toast to cook but if you like it lite like me, its fine. You can not leave the tongs in their holder while using the toaster. They get very hot! Had this for about a year or more. Still works great.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nicolich

customer_reviews.title: This toaster is everything I wanted in a toaster.
customer_reviews.text: I use my new Hamilton Beach toaster almost everyday. It toasts both sides fairly even...better than any others I have had in the past. I like the modern design sitting on my counter. I haven't had to use the tongs because it pops high enough and you can boost the bread with the lever. I would definitely recommend this toaster. In fact I already have recommended it to a couple of people who have visited.
customer_reviews.author: runninwyld

customer_reviews.title: Good so far.
customer_reviews.text: Have only used you for a few weeks , but so far so good. Easy to operate and the tongs are nice feature. Somewhat concerned about quality, given the country of origin.
customer_reviews.author: Bob C.

customer_reviews.title: . It toasts.
customer_reviews.text: My last hamilton beach toaster laster more than 15 years so I bought another one. I researched toasters and based on the reviews I bought it. It toasts unevenly at all setting light to dark. I hate when a third or more of a bagel or slice of toast is not toasted or very light. I also ordered an Oster 4 slice toaster for my grandson hoping it would do a better job.. instead of tongs Hamilton Beach should have put more engineering into toasting.
customer_reviews.author: easy writer

customer_reviews.title: Great Toaster! But
customer_reviews.text: Great Toaster! But, just stopped working after a short time. If it worked like it was supposed to, I admit, I would've been happy with it! Probably just a lemon. But, if there's a buncha' reviews saying the same thing...."Houston....we have a problem!"
customer_reviews.author: HawaiianEyeTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Got here yesterday already have used it a few times there's nothing to complain about this lovely toaster is kinda tall but lovely }}}}}}}}}BUT THE SHIPPING WAS FAST BUT THEY LEFT IT ON THE SIDE OF THE HOUSE WERE THE WHOLE BOX GOT WET thankful the toaster and the other box inside the wet one prevented the toaster from getting wet{{{{{{{{{
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Hamilton Beach Smart Toaster
customer_reviews.text: Hamilton Beach Smart Toaster never fails. I still have it all this time, and it still works great! I love how it has the tong at the end where you can grab the toast with, super convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Jade30

customer_reviews.title: Not a big fan...........
customer_reviews.text: I was looking at a higher end toaster and decided to get this one because of price...... It does make toast but is inconsistent even on the same setting........bottom of bread gets darker than the rest. However, I do like the tongs because we use small bread slices.
customer_reviews.author: UncleRed

customer_reviews.title: So far so good anything I toast comes out near perfect
customer_reviews.text: So far so good anything I toast comes out near perfect. I just don't like the lever being plastic when I push it down it does not feel sturdy to me & I'm skeptical about it snapping off.
customer_reviews.author: The Beas

customer_reviews.title: Stuck on bagel setting
customer_reviews.text: I read the great reviews on this toaster, and was excited when it arrived. The toaster worked fine for the first month or so. Now it seems to be stuck on the bagel (one side only) setting, which I have never used, and it barely toasts the other side of a regular slice of bread. Even after adjusting the temperature setting, the toaster still has this problem. Sometimes, if I insert a slice of bread twice, I get something representing a slice of toast. This was a replacement for a 10 year old, poorly performing toaster. I guess I should have held on to the old toaster.
customer_reviews.author: MizGee

customer_reviews.title: great toaster
customer_reviews.text: Great little toaster for a great low price. I was concerned that it may not be substantial because of its light weight but works great and the light weight is probably actually a plus. It toasts evenly and I really like the bagel setting. Having the tongs was not a selling point for me but they have come in very handy. It has an easily removable crumb tray - something that is not included in the product information. I recommend this toaster.
customer_reviews.author: L Baker

customer_reviews.title: Beauty
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice toaster & the way they have it built I have hardly ever needed to use the tongs to get anything out, Seems like the lifter comes up far enough to even get a little piece of rye bread up to grab it. Seems to toast even enough for me with one or two slices. No complaints so far.
customer_reviews.author: G Mac

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED! I really expected more from Hamilton Beach
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I gave it a star is for the color. I've had this less than 2 months and have used it a couple of times. Today I tried to use it and the lever to lower the toast, doesn't lock down...leaving the toaster completely unusable. VERY DISAPPOINTED! I really expected more from Hamilton Beach!!!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Snyder

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. We go thru a toaster about every 2 yrs, so let's see. The kids love the toaster tongs. I was sad about no retractable cord, but the cord is short enough and winds easily around some cleats on the bottom to keep the cord manageable (we store it in a cabinet). Crumb tray is easy to empty and slide back in.
customer_reviews.author: Sitnspin

customer_reviews.title: so far, ok
customer_reviews.text: ive had this about a month now, love the way it looks, the tongs come in handy. it seems to toast the top half of the bread much faster than the bottom half, but im kinda picky, so that might just be me. the bagel setting works well. havent had occasion to use the defrost.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer l

customer_reviews.title: Good one!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Well, number one, I bought it because I needed a toaster. Number two, it was RED!!! The crumb catcher at the bottom of the toaster slides out for easy cleaning. My old one just had a latch that you pulled open to dump the contents out. The tongs are nice to have, too.
customer_reviews.author: Bendy W

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and plastic.
customer_reviews.text: I actually returned this item - for the price, I expected something better quality. The toaster seemed light/plastic/poorly made. I wasn't at all convinced it would hold up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Hamilton Beach Ensemble SmartToast Extra-Wide Slot Toaster
product_meta.description: Hamilton Beach 2 Slice Toasters are popular not only for their expert toasting performance-they also look great in your kitchen. Wider slots and smart buttons allow you to uniformly toast and warm bagels, English muffins and other breads, and advanced toasting technology ensures consistent results with each use.
feature_bullets: Automatic shutoff if toast gets jammed

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars1,146 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
